title: SPDR S&P 400 Mid Cap Value Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for MDYV - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the SPDR S&P 400 Mid Cap Value ETF (Symbol: MDYV) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $49.84, changing hands as high as $50.35 per share. SPDR S&P 400 Mid Cap Value shares are currently trading up about 2.4% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of MDYV shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
